wikipedia_page.main: John Boag (14 February 1965 – 2006) was a footballer and captain of Greenock Morton. He also spent a short time with the Royal Mail .

response: * John Boag (footballer, born 1965) (1965–2006), Scottish football defender
* John Boag (footballer, born 1874) (1874–1954), Scottish football centre forward
* John Boag (writer) (1775–1863), Scottish evangelist, pastor, and lexicographer
